name: Capacitance Stun
description: This exists to make Capacitance sap moves from the user.

name: Capacitance Zap
description: This exists to make Capacitance zap the user.

name: Conjure Miasma Fungicide
description: This adds a decent chance of spawning fungicidal gas as well.

name: Conjure Miasma Nukage
description: This adds a small chance of spawning radioactive gas as well.

name: Conjure Miasma Tear Gas
description: This adds a chance of spawning tear gas as well.

name: Aftermath: Shadow Blindness
description: This inflicts momentary blindness on targets caught in it.

name: Aftermath: Consecrate Dispel Summons
description: Increasingly massive damage to any hostile summoned monsters in the area of effect.

name: Aftermath: Consecrate Daze Intruders
description: Dazes specific nether monsters.
//: If we ever get a saner way to do this...

name: Aftermath: Consecrate Lesser Effect
description: Weaker version of the sub-spell, with a narrower range of valid targets.  Most bosses, and many tougher monsters, are excluded.

name: Drain Life Fatigue
description: This exists to potentially give Dragonblood's version of Drain Life a corruptive side effect on the area.

name: Eclipse Darkness
description: Up to 3 hours of darkness.

name: Eclipse Fatigue
description: Basically the artifact effect, except it will show up just about anywhere in the reality bubble.  Expect anything...

name: Eclipse Halo
description: Adds a standard lifedrain halo.

name: Eclipse Wonder
description: Summons 1d5 legit nether monsters.  Unlike most summon spells, these are 100% fresh interlopers from Beyond.

name: Eclipse Gracken
description: An interloper!

name: Eclipse Amoebic Mold
description: Blobby interloper!

name: Eclipse Kreck
description: Smol interloper!

name: Eclipse Mi-go
description: Intruso, no tu amigo.

name: Eclipse Flaming Eye
description: Also an interloper, and probably the most !!FUN!! kind.

name: Eclipse Flying Polyp
description: Watch it probably roll this effect five times in a row...

name: Elemental Burst Water
description: Applies cold damage, creates fog, and slows down victims.

name: Elemental Burst Fire
description: Applies heat damage, creates fire, mildly annoys victims with hot status effect.

name: Elemental Burst Wind
description: Applies electric damage, creates lightning, and zaps victims.

name: Elemental Burst Earth
description: Applies acid damage, creates acid, corrodes victims.

name: Elemental Sign Coldness
description: This exists to give Elemental Sign cold damage and sap temperature from the area.

name: Elemental Sign Stun
description: This exists to make Elemental Sign freeze targets briefly.

name: Infernal Flame Corruption
description: This exists only to add destruction of natural terrain to Infernal Flame.

name: Infernal Flame Field
description: This exists to add a chance of lingering anomalous fire after Infernal Flame impacts.

name: Sundering Quake Boulders
description: This exists to add rubble and other changes to Sundering Quake.

name: Suppression Buff
description: This exists to grant the long-term status effect to Suppression.

name: Surging Force Timewarp
description: Za warudo!  This exists to make Surging Force give you a free moves.

name: Wave of Destruction Pulse
description: This adds the actual effect of yeeting terrain in range.

name: Blessing: Agility
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will grant a temporary speed and agility-enhancing effect.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: Time seems to slow for a moment, as you channel a rush of energy.
//: Difficulties for all Arcane Blessings will be added back in once spell-failure skill is unhardcoded, and difficulties for Magic Signs will be added too.

name: Blessing: Clairvoyance
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will anoint you with an ivory halo, granting you sight beyond sight.
message: A shimmering aura permeates you, opening your eyes to hidden truths.

name: Blessing: Confuse Monsters
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will stun all hostiles in the area around you.
message: A faint distortion in the air ripples out all around, and you sense an unearthly force exerting its will.

name: Blessing: Conjure Miasma
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will engulf the targeted area in a swirling miasma of various poisonous vapors, afflicting many forms of harm.
message: A rush of unnatural wind swirls at your command, bringing forth myriad poisonous gales with it.

name: Blessing: Conjure Lightburst
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will conjure a flood of magical illumination at the targeted area.
message: Flickering candle-flames of light scatter across the ground at your guidance, before a lingering glow permeates that area.

name: Blessing: Conjure Shadows
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will envelop the targeted area in lingering darkness, in addition to inflicting blindness on enemies caught in the initial effect.
message: Wisps of inky, living shadow emerge from the ground, engulfing the area as you will it.

name: Blessing: Consecrate
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will alter the terrain, driving off various signs of otherworldly corruption afflicting the land, along with dispelling hostile summons and sickening most intruders from Beyond.
message: You channel the will of He From Beyond The Veil, to bring order to this unearthly intrusion.

name: Blessing: Divine Storm
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will call forth a storm of unearthly lightning all around you, smiting and striking foes blind.
message: A ring of strange blue light encircles you, before pale bolts of lightning surge out in every direction.

name: Blessing: Drain Life
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will anoint you with a horned halo, granting you a life-draining effect.
message: A shimmering aura permeates you, sparking a yearning for battle and the death of your enemies.

name: Blessing: Holy Flare
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will conjure an eruption of otherworldly flames at the location targeted, that will leave the terrain unharmed.
message: A spark of radiant golden flame erupts from out of thin air, by your command.

name: Blessing: Holy Ward
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will create an aura protecting against blades, and guard against various anomalous hazards.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: You feel the threads of reality pulled taut, as a powerful protective spell is channeled through you.

name: Blessing: Illusion Cloak
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will cloak one in illusions, hiding them from sight and protecting against certain optical effects.
message: You channel a shimmering aura, that fades into swirling illusory shadows.

name: Blessing: Might
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will grant a temporary boost to strength.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: You feel raw strength channeled through you, surging forth at your command.

name: Blessing: Open Lock
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will conjure a mote of artifice that can be used to open locked doors.
message: You focus, and a shimmering ball of energy appears in your hands.

name: Blessing: Pacify Monsters
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will momentarily sway monsters to your side.  It only works on monsters that have been sufficently weakened, but the effectiveness increases with spell level.
message: You focus, channeling a soothing aura through your hands.

name: Blessing: Radiant Burst
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will blast a cone-shaped area with a crackling burst of energy, striking enemies blind with divine lightning.
message:
Arcane Blessing
Unearthly trails of lightning arc outward, bathing a swath ahead of you in an eerie glow.

name: Blessing: Summon Centipedes
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will summon mutated vermin, which will be a permanent presence when this spell is at full proficiency.
message: You focus, imagery of false omens being averted lingering in your mind, as unnatural vermin slither into existence.

name: Blessing: Summon Homunculus
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will summon a mimicry of the human form, which will be a permanent presence when this spell is at full proficiency.
message: You focus, imagery of false omens lingering in your mind as a living construct is called to serve you.

name: Blessing: Summon Skeletal Dogs
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will summon a number of animalistic revenants, which will be a permanent presence when this spell is at full proficiency.
message: You focus, imagery of a dead world lingering in your mind as an undead hunting pack surges forth.

name: Blessing: Summon Skeleton
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will summon a humanoid revenant, which will be a permanent presence when this spell is at full proficiency.
message: You focus, imagery of humanity's extinction lingering in your mind as an undead servant appears before you.

name: Blessing: Summon Thing
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will summon a tentacled abomination, which will be a permanent presence when this spell is at full proficiency.
message: You focus, imagery of the horrors your enemies embody lingering in your mind, as a writhing mass of tendrils wavers into existence.

name: Blessing: Summon Vortices
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will summon swirling beings from Beyond, which will be a permanent presence when this spell is at full proficiency.
message: You focus, imagery of uncertain, distant futures lingering in your mind, as the living wind heeds your call.

//: ID retained, since this was already added under that name.
name: Blessing: Surging Force
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will provoke a rush of adrenaline and warp time for urgent situations, albeit with the same drawbacks afterward.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: You channel an uplifting rush of energy, time seeming to slow momentarily.

name: Blessing: Wall of Force
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will conjure a magical barrier where you target it, which can be used to trap enemies if placed carefully.
message: A flickering flame marks the ground for a moment, before an impenetrable barrier envelops it.  Examine it to dismiss the barrier.

name: Blessing: Ward (Acid)
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will grant a blessing that completely protects against acid, even direct contact.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: You channel a shimmering aura, and the air passing through carries a faintly bitter scent to it.

name: Blessing: Ward (Cold)
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will protect against the cold, and certain forms of supernatural harm.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: You channel a protective aura, the air gaining a soothing warmth to it.

name: Blessing: Ward (Flame)
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will completely protect against fire, as well as the side effects caused by heat and smoke.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: You channel a protective aura, the air seeming chilled by your actions.

name: Blessing: Ward (Lightning)
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will grant a blessing that completely protects against lightning.  It can be used on yourself or on an ally.
message: You channel a soothing, insulating aura.

name: Blessing: Ward (Poison)
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will grant a blessing that protects against toxic gas and other forms of poison.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: You channel energy, spreading a revitalizing glow by your will.

name: Blessing: Wave of Destruction
description:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will unleash a devastating, destructive blast of force, scouring the very land itself.
message: The very air wavers as an otherworldly roar resounds, blasting everything around you with the lightning of an unnatural storm.

//: Todo: add a difficulty of 1 and remove no-failure from the item's action, if it turns out that skill reasonably reduces an unleveled spell's failure rate to be feasible, when spell skill is no longer hardcoded.
name: Sanguine Art
description: Prepares a ritual to turn part of your life force into a usable form of essence.  Doing so will take 5 minutes, inflicting blood loss and damage at the end, as well as potential consequences if overused...
message: You work a ritual to draw power from your own blood, instinct guiding your hand as you trace patterns across your skin with the dull blade.  As you work the last rune, the only one to actually break the skin, wounds open elsewhere on your body!

name: Sanguine Art Corruption
description: This inflicts the more insidious effects of the athame.  That's 2 entire days of side-effect buildup per use, by the way.

//: Todo: add a difficulty of 3 and remove no-failure from the item's action, if it turns out that skill reasonably reduces an unleveled spell's failure rate to be feasible, when spell skill is no longer hardcoded.
name: Offering
description: Prepares a ritual to turn part of your life force into a usable form of essence.  Doing so will take 15 minutes, inflicting harm upon your body at the end, as well as dire consequences if overused...
message: You work a ritual to draw power from your own breath, drawn by instinct to whisper words in an unfamiliar language.  The verses complete, you raise the chalice as if to drink from it, only for your breath to be drawn from your lungs!

name: Offering Windedness
description: This is so that the chalice ritual actually knocks the wind out of you.

name: Offering Corruption
description: This inflicts the more insidious effects of the chalice.  That's 2 entire days of side-effect buildup per use, by the way.

name: Generate Blood Essence
description: This is used by blood magic items to produce blood essence.

name: Aegis Mending
description: Forces the body to heal itself, but also hurts quite a bit.
message: Your cloak shimmers with odd light, and a painful jolt of healing power surges through you!

name: Aegis Pain Side Effect
description: Take your medicine, Hunter.

name: Hauberk Mending
description: Weaker healing than gilded aegis, but less pain.
message: Your armor's mantle shimmers with an odd light, sending the dull ache of healing magic through your body.

name: Hauberk Pain Side Effect
description: Still stings a bit.

name: Bolt From Beyond
description: Blasts everything in AoE with lightning.
message: A surge of energy strikes the ground as you raise the verge, resounding with a thunderous blast!

name: Verge Pulse
description: This adds the terrain damage.

name: Gaze Into Greater Horizons
description: Knowledge is power, but power comes at a price...
message: You look deep into the orb, and see a vision of the surrounding area hidden among headache-inducing geometries.

name: Orb: Revelation
description: Grants a random duration of the Revelation spell effect.
message: A surge of strange visions flood your mind...

name: Orb Attention
description: Applies nether attention, lower duration because the orb comes with a host of random side effects.

name: Orb Random Effects
description: Random side effects to using the orb of the veil.

name: Orb: Archon Effect
description: Applies a decent dose of the archon's gaze effect.
message: You saw something looking back at you, far more intently than the other things out there...

name: Orb: Blindness
description: Blinds you for for a modest duration.
message: You see a blinding white light among the strange visions within.

name: Orb: Incense
description: Grants a random duration of citrine incense's effect.
message: Wisps of enervating essence accompany the visions, seeming far more real than the hallucinations...

name: Orb: Hallucinations
description: Grants a random duration of hallucinations.
message: Even after you look away from the orb, the visions linger in the back of your mind...

name: Orb: Insight
description: Grants a random duration of the Insight spell effect.
message: A glimpse of otherworldly insight floods your mind.

name: Orb: Stun
description: Stuns for for a short duration.
message: The visions within the orb leave you reeling for a moment.

name: Orb: Ward
description: Grants a random duration of Ward Against Evil.
message: You see a vision of something watching over you, among the strange sights within the orb.

name: Orb Random Summon
description: Wonder-ception, this summons a random monster.
message: For some reason, the visions in the orb seem a lot more real than they should...

name: Orb Summon: Krecks
description: Somewhere out there are critters that shouldn't be real, but are...

name: Orb Summon: Fiend
description: Somewhere out there is a critter that shouldn't be real, but is...

name: Orb Summon: Shadows
description: Somewhere out there are critters that shouldn't be real, but are...

name: Orb Summon: Angel
description: Somewhere out there is a critter that shouldn't be real, but is...

name: Orb Summon: Vortices
description: Somewhere out there are critters that shouldn't be real, but are...

name: Pestilence Summons
description: Mutated vermin come to your aid.
message: Vermin slither out from the earth at your feet, heeding your call.

name: Pestilence Aftermath
description: Destruction of natural terrain around you.

name: Opus Magnum
description: Minor healing, and the restorative power of a healing potion.
message: You drink the potion and feel a pleasant warmth spread through your body.

name: Call to Order
description: Attempts to pacify monsters for a moderate duration, paralyzes user and inflicts pain.
message: "By order, we ascend beyond that of animals."  A wave of energy radiates outwards, fragments of otherworldly perspectives flooding your mind in the process!

name: Divine Scroll: Artifice Pain
description: Used instead of Artifact Pain to suppress the message and make the range more narrow.

name: Divine Scroll: Artifice Paralysis
description: This gives scrolls of command a brief brain-zap, longer than normal artifact paralysis.

name: Cry of Hatred
description: Similar effects to Wave of Destruction, though with different side effects.
message: "There is an end to all things."  A horrible cacophony resounds, rising to a thunderous boom that blasts your surroundings with flame!

name: Divine Scroll: Destruction Attention
description: This is used instead of Artifact Attention to suppress the message and narrow the duration range.

name: Divine Scroll: Destruction Coldness
description: This adds a chill to the air, inflicted by scrolls of sundering.

name: Divine Scroll: Destruction Pulse
description: This adds a highly-random pulse effect to the scroll.

name: Scroll: Leftovers
description: This exists to make magic scrolls leave a blank scroll when used up, obsoleting the previous hack of making the item transform to exploit revert_to.

name: Sightless Sanctuary
description: Overwhelming darkness, both in field and event form, blinds monsters.
message: "Do not fear the unknown."  A shadowy mist spreads out in all directions, wisps of living dark trailing upwards to blot out everything in its wake!

name: Divine Scroll: Moon Blinding Effect
description: This blinds all targets in the area for a random amount of time.

name: Divine Scroll: Moon Event
description: This adds 30 minutes of darkness.

name: Chaotic Mending
description: Massive dose of unpredictable healing, widespread application of Overgrowth, risk of mutation.
message: "Do not deny your instincts."  Life flows through your body, radiating out in a burst of chaotic energy!

name: Divine Scroll: Nature Plant Effect
description: Basically just a beefier version of Overgrowth.

name: Divine Scroll: Nature Wonder
description: Randomizes what mutation spell the scroll rolls for.

name: Divine Scroll: Nature Mutation 1
description: Comparable to Artifact Mutate, except mimics effect of blood effigy.

name: Divine Scroll: Nature Mutation 2
description: Comparable to Artifact Mutate, except focused on Plant category.

name: Elusive Gateway
description: Teleports you away, leaving a mess of nasty shit behind you.  Uses a lot of Archon-specific effects, but that's mainly because they're more useful for what this spell should do, the entity the scroll is dedicated to probably isn't the Archon.
message: "Cast aside the veil of reality."  You feel yanked in a non-existent direction!

name: Divine Scroll: Subversion Shadows
description: Neherit, otira atvess...except, not really.

name: Divine Scroll: Subversion Teleport
description: Yeets you rather far away.  The one benefit is it's a safe teleport.  Effect is last to hopefully ensure you leave the other side effects behind.

name: Solar Blessing
description: Massive wave of light, sunlight event, adrenaline and morale.
message: "Let purity guide your hand and your heart."  A brilliant radiance envelops your surroundings, piercing the heavens as a surge of power flows through your body!

name: Divine Scroll: Sun Adrenaline
description: Uses this instead of Artifact Adrenaline mainly to suppress the message, also changes duration range.

name: Divine Scroll: Sun Event
description: This adds 30 minutes of sunlight.

name: Divine Scroll: Sun Timewarp
description: Oh hey, what's with divine magics combining adrenaline with timestop...

name: Spark Flame
description: Spark a small fire nearby.
message: Embers fly from your fingertips, stoking magical flames as they fall to the ground.

name: Familiar Pact
description: Binds friendly summoned monsters to you, making it serve as a pet if it isn't already fully tamed.
message: Faint wisps of mist fly from the talisman, to bring enlightenment through a bond with your own mind.
//: 200 days, since the permanent spell flag doesn't seem to actually work for this.

name: Hand of Thunder
description: A short-ranged jolt, doing minor damage and stunning the target.
message: A bolt of blood-red lightning arcs from your fingertips, fading to a natural coloration as it courses through your victim!

name: Gauntlet Lifedrain
description: Oh, now the reference in the item ID makes sense!

name: Wyrm's Venom
description: A low-level acid spell, with greater focus on range and ground effect.
message: Flowing venom slithers over the surface of your armor, until an acrid spray lashes out and soaks the ground!

name: Sign: Agility
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant a temporary speed and agility-enhancing effect.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "Ethereal winds, guide my passage..."  You cast %s!

//: Internal math note: treat value of Capacitance as 5.
name: Sign: Capacitance
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will channel your energy into artifice within the body, restoring bionic energy at the cost of fatigue.  Doing so will shock yourself, however.
message: "Dns nobis virtus..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Clairvoyance
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will anoint you with an ivory halo, granting you sight beyond sight.
message: "Show me what eyes could never glimpse..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Clarity of Blood
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant protection against parasites and the Mycus.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "You are many, but I am more than all of you..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Cold Ward
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will protect against the cold, and all its side effects.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "I am that which protects, offering mercy in troubled times..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Confuse Monster
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will stun all hostiles in the area around you.
message: "No blade may mark me, if the hand cannot strike true..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Conjure Acid
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will conjure a splash of acid at the point targeted.
message: "Let it be as time itself, eroding all in its path..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Conjure Flame
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will conjure an eruption of flames at the location targeted.
message: "Let this be your pyre..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Consecrate
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will alter the terrain around you, driving off various signs of otherworldly corruption afflicting the land.  It will also weaken some otherworldly monsters, to a limited extent.
message: "I am that which reveals the wicked, and scourges them with flame..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Dampening
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will anoint you with a coral halo, sapping energy from fires and drawing radiation from your body.
message: "Let the flames part, as vermin fleeing before me..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Eclipse
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will inflict a shallow wound in The Veil, bringing forth monsters and darkness in exchange for a temporary boost of raw power with which to stalk the night.
message: "I am that which stands defiant, the finite made infinite..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Elemental Burst
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will blast a cone-shaped area with a random elemental effect.
message: "I am that which resides in all living things, the order hidden within chaos..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Free Action
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant protection against paralytic effects and other hindrances.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "Let there be no fetter that can bind me..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Healing
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will staunch bleeding and mend wounds, though overuse can be harmful in the long run.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "We shall not yet fall into extinction..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Heat Ward
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant temporary resistance to heat and smoke.  Direct contact with flame will still cause harm, however.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "The steel does not fear the flame that tempers it..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Insight
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant a temporary boost to perception.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "All is known to one who watches and listens with patience..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Light
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will conjure a field of magical light, lingering in the area around you.
message: "The smallest candle flame brings hope until the dawn..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Lightning Ward
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant a blessing that completely protects against lightning, at the expense of slowing you down a bit.  It can be cast on yourself or an ally.
message: "One foot after the other, always grounded..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Might
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant a temporary boost to strength.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "Let it be a glorious battle..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Open Lock
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will conjure a mote of artifice that can be used to open locked doors.
message: "That which is made by man can always be undone by human hands..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Overgrowth
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will conjure an eruption of the living forest, at the location you target.
message: "We shall prosper, no matter how barren the ground..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Poison Armor
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant a blessing that protects against toxic gas and other forms of poison.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "I fear no venom, whether it be by word or blade..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Serpentine Shield
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will anoint you with an obsidian halo, granting a temporary defensive effect that will summon shadowy serpents to aid you.
message: "Fear not the darkness, but those who lure you into it..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Shockstorm
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will call forth lightning all around you, harming any hostiles that are close enough.
message: "Let it be a thunder to split the heavens and earth..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Sundering Quake
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will bring down structures and bury them in rubble, though creatures will be left unharmed.
message: "I am that which lies beneath, splitting continents with but a word..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Summon Centipedes
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will summon mutated vermin, which will be loyal but not permanent.
message: "I am that which is grim yet necessary, for there is no life without death..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Summon Skeletal Dog
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will summon an animalistic revenant, which will be loyal but not permanent.
message: "Loyal unto death, and even beyond..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Summon Shadow
//: Internal math note: treat value of Summon Shadow as 5.
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will summon a living shadow, which will be loyal but not permanent.
message: "Neherit, otira atvess..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Summon Shadow Snake
//: Internal math note: treat value of Summon Shadow Snake as 4.
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will summon a living shadow in serpentine form, which will be loyal but not permanent.
message: "Neherit, ievona karoh..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Surge of Adrenaline
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will provoke a rush of adrenaline for urgent situations, albeit with the same drawbacks afterward.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "The battle is not over yet..."  You cast %s!

name: Sign: Ward Against Evil
description:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant a blessing that protects against certain anomalous threats.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
message: "The wicked falter before the vigilant..."  You cast %s!

name: Mark: Drain Life
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will anoint you with a horned halo, granting a life-draining effect.  The cost may be greater than the reward.
message: You gesture, and are filled with a yearning for the hunt.  %s!

name: Mark: Elemental Sign
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will grant temporary resistance to heat and smoke, and sap heat from all around you.  Direct contact with flame will still cause harm.
message: With a gesture, your inner fire flares up.  %s!

name: Mark: Infernal Flame
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will conjure an eruption of hellfire at the location targeted, inflicting horrific burns and leaving a permanent scar upon the land.
message: With a wave of the hand, fire leaps from the ground itself.  %s!

name: Mark: Might
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will grant a temporary boost to strength.
message: A lust for battle surges through you as you complete the ritual gesture.  %s!

name: Mark: Revenant Blood
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will grant protection against pestilence in food and water, and against the Mycus.  The body will burn through its reserves faster however.
message: With a sign, you feel your blood burning with magical power.  %s!

name: Mark: Summon Dark Wyrm
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will summon a dark wyrm.  Although it will be permanent at maximum power, whether it will obey you is completely up to chance.
message: Your gesture causes the ground to shift and flow, a pitch-black form slithering out of the earth itself.  %s!

name: Mark: Summon Fiend
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will summon an ashen revenant.  Although it will be permanent at maximum power, whether it will obey you is completely up to chance.
message: With a hand sign, a plume of living flame erupts from the ground, solidifying into a scorched humanoid form.  %s!

name: Mark: Summon Jabberwock
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will summon a golem woven of flesh.  Although it will be permanent at maximum power, whether it will obey you is completely up to chance.
message: The ground warps at your command, a host of rotting bodies emerging from the disturbance, forms fusing together into an abomination.  %s!

name: Mark: Suppression
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will anoint you with a coral halo, sapping energy from fires and radiation.   It will dull the fire within you, slowing your metabolism.
message: You raise your hand, and the odd warmth within your body seems to burn less intensely.  %s!

name: Mark: Surge of Adrenaline
description:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will provoke a rush of adrenaline for urgent situations, albeit with the same drawbacks afterward.
message: Your gesture provokes a rush of instinct, urging you to kill.  %s!
